title: "New Vodafone CEO among 14 execs selected for PM’s business council"
excerpt: "Today, the UK government has unveiled fourteen chief executives that will form a new business council set to advise the Prime Minister on economic policy. The group comprises the CEOs of AstraZeneca, NatWest Group, BAE, SSE, Google DeepMind, Sainsbury’s, Vodafone, GSK, Aviva, Shell, Sage, Taylor Wimpey, Diageo, and Barclays."
